Title: Like We're Any Other Couple
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Randy Huggins, Vladimir Cvetko (story editor), Safia Dirie (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Ghost and Angela enjoy a getaway in Miami until reality intrudes on their fantasy life as a couple; Tommy and Kanan bond.
